JavaApi.Samplers.QuerySamplers
Class QueryWrapper

java.lang.Object
  JavaApi.Samplers.QuerySamplers.QueryWrapper

public class QueryWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

A wrapper class for query management (execution and sampling results)

Constructor Summary
QueryWrapper(java.lang.String stringQuery, SamplingMode mode)
          Simple constructor that initializes the query and sampling mode
QueryWrapper(java.lang.String stringQuery, SamplingMode mode, IRealNumberSampler realNumSampler)
          Constructor that sets the IRealNumberSampler that will be used to return a portion of the results in addition to setting the query and sampling-mode
QueryWrapper(java.lang.String stringQuery, SamplingMode mode, IRealNumberSampler realNumSampler, boolean isDynamic)
          Constructor that sets all parameters, but specifically enables the user to define this query as a dynamic query Which means that it uses results of previous queries in it.
 
Method Summary
 SamplingMode getMode()
          Returns the sampling-mode used to return the query results
 java.lang.String getQuery()
          Returns the string query
 IRealNumberSampler getRealNumberSampler()
          Returns the IRealNumberSampler instance used to return query results
 boolean isDynamic()
          Returns true iff the query is a dynamic query, otherwise false
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

QueryWrapper

public QueryWrapper(java.lang.String stringQuery,
                    SamplingMode mode)
Simple constructor that initializes the query and sampling mode

Parameters:
stringQuery - - The actual SPARQL query
mode - - The sampling mode used to return results

QueryWrapper

public QueryWrapper(java.lang.String stringQuery,
                    SamplingMode mode,
                    IRealNumberSampler realNumSampler)
Constructor that sets the IRealNumberSampler that will be used to return a portion of the results in addition to setting the query and sampling-mode

Parameters:
stringQuery - - The actual SPARQL query
mode - - The sampling mode used to return results
realNumSampler - - The IRealNumberSampler instance that will be used for the sampling

QueryWrapper

public QueryWrapper(java.lang.String stringQuery,
                    SamplingMode mode,
                    IRealNumberSampler realNumSampler,
                    boolean isDynamic)
Constructor that sets all parameters, but specifically enables the user to define this query as a dynamic query Which means that it uses results of previous queries in it.

Parameters:
stringQuery - - The actual SPARQL query
mode - - The sampling mode used to return results
realNumSampler - - The IRealNumberSampler instance that will be used for the sampling
isDynamic - - Sets/Marks this query as a dynamic query (query which uses results of previous queries in it)

public SamplingMode getMode()
Returns the sampling-mode used to return the query results

Returns:
- The sampling-mode used to return the query results

getRealNumberSampler

public IRealNumberSampler getRealNumberSampler()
Returns the IRealNumberSampler instance used to return query results

Returns:
- The IRealNumberSampler instance used to return query results

isDynamic

public boolean isDynamic()
Returns true iff the query is a dynamic query, otherwise false

Returns:
- True iff the query is a dynamic query, otherwise false
